text: Nge i Joas ratahigi tau Juda u lei doluegi na gineu ngerehi rau tabutebu retamara Jehosabat, Jehoram me i Ahasia, ratahigi tu Juda, me a betebete hi ngeie sibona u betera me a vatu meraga doluegi rau haqera lolo tantanoi mane lo tantano gogona noi HUQE me lolo vale lawoa noi ratahigi, me mo horara lawe Hasael ratahigi tau Aram, siu ngeie mo rovo dena Jerusalem.
